item.title: Suspected drug trafficker arrested in Nokomis
item.description: Lewis faces multiple charges, including firearm possession and drug trafficking.

item.description: Three juveniles arrested after a park shooting

item.title: Kilwin’s in St. Armands Circle opens after Damage in 2024 from Hurricane Milton
item.description: Kilwin’s in St. Armands Circle opens after Damage in 2024 from Hurricane Milton

item.title: Ben Milliken wrapping up a four-year run with the SCS Blazers
item.description: This week’s ABC7 Athlete of the Week is Sarasota Christian School’s Ben Milliken.

item.title: Man convicted of trying to assassinate Trump tried to stab himself in the neck after guilty verdict was read
item.description: A man has been found guilty of trying to assassinate President Donald Trump last year at his Florida golf course.

item.title: Loophole doomed Bean Point’s no-swim ordinance, Anna Maria mayor says
item.description: Mayor Mark Short vetoed this ordinance at a Sept. 15 meeting.

item.title: Deputy-involved shooting reported in Punta Gorda
item.description: No deputies were shot and the medical condition of a suspect is unknown at this time.

item.title: Traffic signal upgrades may slow traffic on Clark Road
item.description: Roadwork at Clark Road and Honore Ave may cause delays with lane closures.

item.title: 3 people, including detainees, shot at immigration facility in Dallas and the shooter is dead, official says
item.description: The director of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement says three people have been shot at an ICE office in Dallas and the shooter is dead from a self-inflicted gunshot wound.

item.title: Still watching the tropics as we wait for a brief, small taste of fall
WATCH LIVE: Gov. Ron DeSantis to hold press conference at USF Tampa with First Lady and health officials
item.description: The governor will be joined by Florida Surgeon General Dr. Joseph Ladapo.

item.title: All lanes closed by crash on I-75S in Sarasota County
item.description: All lanes near the Toledo Blade Blvd exit 179 are currently closed.

item.title: Skyway Bridge closed by law enforcement activity
item.description: Motorists are advised to seek alternative travel routes until further notice.
